law.catch_line: Contracts Of Unlicensed Schools Or Representatives; Enforceability
law.text: [ Text of section effective until August 1, 2012. Repealed by 2012, 106, Sec. 2. See 2012, 106, Sec. 9.] No contract of a correspondence school not licensed under section two, and no contract of a correspondence school procured by a representative not licensed under section three, shall be enforceable in the courts of the commonwealth.
